definition: guilty of crime or serious offense, someone who has committed a crime or has been legally convicted of a crime
details:
adjective
- guilty of crime or serious offense
= example: guilty of crime or serious offense
- involving or being or having the nature of a crime
= example: involving or being or having the nature of a crime
= synonyms: felonious
- bringing or deserving severe rebuke or censure
= example: bringing or deserving severe rebuke or censure
= synonyms: vicious
noun
- someone who has committed a crime or has been legally convicted of a crime
= synonyms: crook, felon, outlaw, malefactor
